content.html: Are you going to #OSSummit? I will be bringing "secret swag" Open Source Dumpster Fire challenge coins with me. There are rules though, to get one you have to: 1. Find me (try the AWS booth?) 2. Tell me one of your open source stories or trade me something cool. 3. Get coin.
content.value:
Are you going to #OSSummit? I will be bringing "secret swag" Open Source Dumpster Fire challenge coins with me. There are rules though, to get one you have to:
1. Find me (try the AWS booth?)
2. Tell me one of your open source stories or trade me something cool.
3. Get coin.

photo.alt: Challenge Coin, with picture of dumpster on fire and the phrase "The Strongest Steel Is Forged in the Fire of a Dumpster"
Reverse of challenge coin, showing the words "open source" and a drawing of a firefighter.
